extends java.lang.Object
implements ServerConnectionListener, InteractionObserver

    • replyHandler

      public void replyHandler​(ReplyMessage message) throws MalformedMessageException
      this method is used to manage a reply message coming from the server
      Parameters:
      message - is the message coming from the server
      Throws:
      MalformedMessageException - if the message is not correctly formed
